meanings.sent1: Lima is a beautiful city in Peru.
meanings.sent2: I dream of visiting Lima one day.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken visit Lima? To explore the historic sites!
meanings.sent4: In the heart of Lima, the culture beats like a drum.
meanings.sent5: The colors of Lima's buildings paint a vibrant picture.

meanings.sent1: I enjoy cooking with lima beans.
meanings.sent2: Lima beans are a nutritious addition to any meal.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lima bean go to school? To become a smart bean!
meanings.sent4: The lima bean, a tiny powerhouse of protein.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of simmering lima beans fills the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 1/6 of a mile.
meanings.sent1: The store is just a lima away from my house.
meanings.sent2: I walked a lima to reach the park.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lima cross the road? To measure the distance!
meanings.sent4: The lima stretched out like a ribbon along the road.
meanings.sent5: The lima seemed longer when I was tired from walking.
